name: Emberguard
description:
Search the forest for plants and firewood. But watch out for greedy enemies lurking.

Who knows, you might even find something to defend yourself..

NOTE:  If you experience lags in the browser, please try downloading the executable. The lags should get better the longer you play.

Controls Keyboard moveW/A/S/DinteractEattackF or SPACE or LEFT CLICK
pauseESC Gamepad move LEFT STICKinteractAattackX  or RB
pauseSTART Credits

A game by Nitai Heeb (OrangeJam) & Nils Wallenfang (nilolo).

3D Assets by Niels Asselborn & Nitai Heeb.

Music by Lightspeed.

This game was made for Fireside Jam 2022.

The source code is available on Github!
